definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: They are tireless in hunting for super-profits.
sentences.chinese: 他們總是不倦地追求超額利潤。

sentences.english: As is known to the world, capitalists are tireless in hunting for super profit.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，資本家對超額利潤的追求總是不知疲乏的。

sentences.english: The corporate giants try to drive down wages in order to make superprofits.
sentences.chinese: 公司巨頭們企圖壓低工資以超額利潤。

sentences.english: There are far better uses for their excess profits.
sentences.chinese: 國企的超額利潤可以被更好的使用。
